DOC.brief_summary: This study aim assess efficacy IN 10 003 improve sleep parameter patient Insomnia exhibit difficulty fall asleep stay asleep . The study compare 2 formulation IN 10 003 placebo
DOC.brief_title: Comparison IN 10 003 Placebo Subjects With Insomnia Suffering From Difficulty Falling Asleep Staying Asleep
DOC.criteria: Subjects age 18 65 year age Subjects meet DSM IV diagnostic criterion Insomnia Subjects report time bed NLT 6.5 NMT 9 hour Subjects report one week sleep diary ( least 3 7 night ) TST NMT 6.5 hour Subjects report one week sleep diary ( least 3 7 night ) Wake time sleep > 1.0 hour Subjects report one week sleep diary ( least 3 7 night ) NLT 30 minute time sleep onset On two night PSG screen mean WASO ≥60 minute neither night le 45 minute On two night PSG screen mean LPS ≥20 minute neither night le 15 minute On two night PSG screen TST NMT 6.5 hour two night Subject circadian rhythm disorder include shift work need travel NLT 3 time zone course study Use drug know effect sleep wake function within 5 half life drug two week , whichever come first . Subject history ( past year ) alcohol substance abuse Subject need smoke sleep period time Subject report habitual napping ( 3 time per week )
